entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Webequie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:16 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lansdowne House Airport 08:52 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -16.5°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -18.7°C
Wind: NNW 17 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
